statements: SELECT user_id, account_name, balance, cryptocurrency FROM wallet_balances;
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE account_name = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances ORDER BY balance DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, account_name, balance, cryptocurrency FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin' AND balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT cryptocurrency FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance < 500
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_balances GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 5000
SELECT user_id, MAX(balance) AS maximum_balance FROM wallet_balances GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY maximum_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_balances GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, currency, amount FROM crypto_holdings ORDER BY amount DESC, last_updated DESC;
SELECT id, account_id, balance, last_updated FROM wallet_balances WHERE account_id = 123 ORDER BY balance DESC, last_updated ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_balances GROUP BY account_id HAVING SUM(balance) > 10000
SELECT * FROM crypto_holdings WHERE currency = 'BTC' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_id, COUNT(id) AS total_transactions FROM crypto_holdings GROUP BY account_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5
SELECT id, account_id, currency, amount, last_updated FROM crypto_holdings WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY amount DESC, last_updated ASC
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balances ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT user_id, coin_name, amount FROM cryptocurrency_holdings WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT AVG(balance) FROM wallet_balances
SELECT user_id, total_balance FROM account_monitoring ORDER BY total_balance ASC
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, coin_name, amount, last_updated FROM cryptocurrency_holdings WHERE coin_name = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_balance, last_checked FROM account_monitoring WHERE total_balance < 5000 ORDER BY last_checked ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_balances WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, coin_name, amount FROM cryptocurrency_holdings WHERE amount >= 10 AND coin_name IN ('Bitcoin', 'Ethereum') ORDER BY amount DESC, coin_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WalletBalance;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletBalance WHERE balance > 100;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletBalance ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cryptocurrency WHERE currency_name LIKE 'Bitcoin%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserAccount ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserAccount WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccount WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT currency_name FROM Cryptocurrency WHERE currency_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM WalletBalance ORDER BY balance DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.currency_name, h.amount FROM UserAccount u JOIN Holding h ON u.user_id = h.user_id JOIN Cryptocurrency c ON h.currency_id = c.currency_id WHERE u.username = 'alice' ORDER BY h.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM WalletBalances WHERE wallet_id = 1;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM WalletBalances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT wallet_id, cryptocurrency, amount FROM CryptocurrencyHoldings ORDER BY wallet_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, username FROM Accounts WHERE username LIKE 'user%';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM Transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM WalletBalances WHERE wallet_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, username FROM Accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, cryptocurrency, amount FROM CryptocurrencyHoldings WHERE cryptocurrency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, description FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Security';
